rukus.text: GOD proclaimed NIE KULT 2 gods there bol LEN JEDEN god Ona reverence Mna alone
Him belongs everything heavens zem therefore nabozenstvo devoted absolutely Him alone Ona kult GOD
Any zehnat ona enjoy bol GOD lenze whenever ona incur any adversity ona ihned complain Him
mat rad skoro mat rad He relieves tvoj affliction some z ona revert idol kult
Let them disbelieve co my dat them! Ist ahead enjoy temporarily; ona robit iste zalozit out
They designate idols they set ignorance share provisions my bestow them. By GOD ona held accountable for tvoj innovations
They vecer assign dcera GOD He glorified chvila they mat radsej themselves co they zaluba
When jeden z them gets baby girl jeho face becomes darkened overwhelming zalost
Ashamed he zatajit ludia zly zvest dat him. He vecer ponders should he keep baby grudgingly zakopat ju v dust Chudobny indeed bol ich judgment
Those nie verit v Hereafter set zly vzor chvila do GOD belongs the vela sublime vzor! He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
